trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> row.
trans-unit.target: 代表<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>資料列。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> row represents a single data item in a bound data source.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>資料列都代表繫結的資料來源中的單一資料項目。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Each row contains one cell per column in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>, and each cell displays a single value in the bound data item.
trans-unit.target: 每個資料列包含每個資料行中的一個資料格<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>，和每個資料格會顯示資料繫結項目中的單一值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row within a set of alternating rows.
trans-unit.target: 取得一組替代資料列內的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: Alternating rows are rows to which you can assign different characteristics, such as alternating background colors.
trans-unit.target: 替代資料列是資料列，您可以指定不同的特性，例如更改背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> to indicate the number of rows within a set of alternating rows.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>表示的替代資料列集內的資料列數目。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about alternating rows, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需替代資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.OnPropertyChanged%2A> method to respond to changes to the AlternationIndex property.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.OnPropertyChanged%2A>方法，以回應至 AlternationIndex 屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.OnPropertyChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The AlternationIndex property does not have its own property changed method because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndexProperty> field reuses the read-only <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndexProperty?displayProperty=fullName> field.
trans-unit.target: AlternationIndex 屬性不具有自己的屬性變更的方法，因為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndexProperty>唯讀欄位會重複使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndexProperty?displayProperty=fullName>欄位。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndexProperty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndexProperty>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row within a set of alternating rows.
trans-unit.target: 在一組替代資料列的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 什麼可能會影響該值的相關資訊，請參閱<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndex*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndex*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The AlternationIndexProperty field reuses the read-only <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndexProperty?displayProperty=fullName> field.
trans-unit.target: AlternationIndexProperty 欄位重複使用的唯讀<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndexProperty?displayProperty=fullName>欄位。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndexProperty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content of the row.
trans-unit.target: 排列資料列的內容。

trans-unit.source: The area that is available for the row.
trans-unit.target: 適用於資料列區域。

trans-unit.source: The actual area used by the row.
trans-unit.target: 使用資料列的實際的區域。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template that is used to display the details section of the row.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示資料列的 [詳細資料] 區段的範本。

trans-unit.source: The template that is used to display the row details section or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> setting.
trans-unit.target: 用來顯示資料列範本的詳細資料區段或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>設定。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 什麼可能會影響該值的相關資訊，請參閱<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsTemplate*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsTemplate*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a template selector that provides custom logic for choosing a row details template.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定提供自訂邏輯以選擇的資料列詳細資料範本的範本選擇器。

trans-unit.source: A template selector for choosing the row details template.
trans-unit.target: 選擇資料列詳細資料範本的範本選擇器。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 什麼可能會影響該值的相關資訊，請參閱<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsTemplateSelector*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsTemplateSelector*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsTemplateSelector*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates when the details section of the row is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出資料列的 [詳細資料] 區段顯示時。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies the visibility of the row details.
trans-unit.target: 值，指定資料列詳細資料的可見性。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 什麼可能會影響該值的相關資訊，請參閱<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsVisibility*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsVisibility*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsVisibility*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the row's data item within the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的資料列資料的項目內的索引<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>集合<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row's data item, or -1 if the item was not found.
trans-unit.target: 索引的資料列資料的項目，則為-1 找不到項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref> that contains the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"> </xref> ，其中包含指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: An element contained in a row to be found.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找的資料列中包含的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref> that contains the specified element.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"> </xref> ，其中包含指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that represents the row header contents.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定物件，表示資料列行首的內容。

trans-unit.source: The row header contents.
trans-unit.target: 資料列行首的內容。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 什麼可能會影響該值的相關資訊，請參閱<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Header*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Header*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Header*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style that is used when rendering the row header.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料列標頭的轉譯時使用的樣式。

trans-unit.source: To define a <xref:System.Windows.Style> for a row header, specify a <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridRowHeader>.
trans-unit.target: 若要定義的<xref:System.Windows.Style>資料列標頭，指定<xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridRowHeader>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridRowHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Style> can be applied to all row headers, or to an individual row header.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Style>可以套用到所有的資料列標題，或個別的資料列行首。</xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: To apply a <xref:System.Windows.Style> to an individual header set the HeaderStyle property, which takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowHeaderStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要套用<xref:System.Windows.Style>至個別的標頭設定的優先順序高於 HeaderStyle 屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowHeaderStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowHeaderStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: The style that is used when rendering the row header.
trans-unit.target: 轉譯資料列行首時使用的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 什麼可能會影響該值的相關資訊，請參閱<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.HeaderStyle*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.HeaderStyle*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template that is used to display the row header.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示資料列標頭的範本。

trans-unit.source: The template that is used to display the row header or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> setting.
trans-unit.target: 用來顯示資料列標頭的範本或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>設定。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定範本選擇器提供自訂邏輯以選擇的資料列標題的範本。

trans-unit.source: A template selector for choosing the row header template.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the row is in editing mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否在資料列處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row is in editing mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在資料列處於編輯模式。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsEditing*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsEditing*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref> is a placeholder for a new item or for an item that has not been committed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref>是新的項目或項目，但尚未認可的預留位置。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref> is a placeholder for a new item or for an item that has not been committed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref>這是一個預留位置，新的項目或項目尚未被認可; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsNewItem*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsNewItem*>

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要選取的資料列。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已選取的資料列。，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected*>

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data item that the row represents.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料列代表的資料項目。

trans-unit.source: The data item that the row represents.
trans-unit.target: 資料列都代表資料項目。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Item*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Item*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template that defines the panel that controls the layout of cells in the row.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定範本，以定義控制項的資料列中的資料格的版面配置面板。

trans-unit.source: The template that defines the panel to use for the layout of cells in the row.
trans-unit.target: 範本會定義要用於資料列中的資料格的版面配置面板。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.ItemsPanel*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.ItemsPanel*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Called to update the displayed cells when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection has changed.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫以更新顯示資料格時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合已變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合。

trans-unit.source: The event data from the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料從<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged>事件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridRowAutomationPeer"></xref> for this row.
trans-unit.target: 傳回新<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridRowAutomationPeer"></xref>這個資料列。

trans-unit.source: A new automation peer for this row.
trans-unit.target: 這個資料列的新自動化對等。

trans-unit.source: Called when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Header*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 時呼叫的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Header*>屬性已變更。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Header*>

trans-unit.source: The previous value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Header*> property.
trans-unit.target: 先前的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Header*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Header*>

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Header*> property.
trans-unit.target: 新值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Header*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Header*>

trans-unit.source: Updates the displayed cells when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Item*> property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: 更新顯示資料格時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Item*>屬性值已變更。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Item*>

trans-unit.source: The previous value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Item*> property.
trans-unit.target: 先前的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Item*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Item*>

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Item*> property.
trans-unit.target: 新值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Item*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Item*>

trans-unit.source: Invoked whenever the effective value of any dependency property on this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref> has been updated.
trans-unit.target: 叫用每當上任何相依性屬性的有效值<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref>已更新。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnPropertyChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnPropertyChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnPropertyChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The specific dependency property that changed is reported in the arguments parameter.
trans-unit.target: 引數參數中報告變更的特定相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to respond to changes to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，以回應變更<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndex%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndex%2A> property does not have its own property changed method because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndexProperty> field reuses the read-only <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndexProperty?displayProperty=fullName> field.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndex%2A>屬性不具有自己的屬性變更的方法，因為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndexProperty>唯讀欄位會重複使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndexProperty?displayProperty=fullName>欄位。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndexProperty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndexProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data that describes the property that changed, as well as old and new values.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料，描述已變更屬性，以及新舊值。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Selected"></xref> event when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected*> property value changes to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Selected"></xref>事件時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected*>屬性值變更為<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected*>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The OnSelected method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnSelected 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: The event data, which is empty when this method is called by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料，資料是空的當這個方法會呼叫<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Called whenever the control's template changes.
trans-unit.target: 每當控制項的範本變更時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The old template.
trans-unit.target: 舊的範本。

trans-unit.source: The new template.
trans-unit.target: 新的範本。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Unselected"></xref> event when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected*> property value changes to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Unselected"></xref>事件時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected*>屬性值變更為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected*>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The OnUnselected method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnUnselected 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: The event data, which is empty when this method is called by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料，資料是空的當這個方法會呼叫<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the row is selected.
trans-unit.target: 在選取的資料列時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected%2A> property value changes to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 就會發生此事件時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected%2A>屬性值變更為`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Selected"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Selected"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the row selection is cleared.
trans-unit.target: 發生於資料列選取範圍已清除。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected%2A> property value changes to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 就會發生此事件時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected%2A>屬性值變更為`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Unselected"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Unselected"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template that is used to visually indicate an error in row validation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來以視覺方式指示列驗證錯誤的範本。

trans-unit.source: The template that is used to visually indicate an error in row validation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowValidationErrorTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> setting.
trans-unit.target: 用來以視覺方式指示列驗證錯誤的範本或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowValidationErrorTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>設定。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 什麼可能會影響該值的相關資訊，請參閱<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.ValidationErrorTemplate*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.ValidationErrorTemplate*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.ValidationErrorTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
